name: Repairture
description:
Repairture is a simple local competitive game for 2-6 players. Your common goal is to repair the rocket and fly away but beware - only one fits in!

Every player can pick up a repair box and use it to repair the rocket or take the repair box out of the rocket. There are multiple strategies for playing this game. You first have to repair the rocket together, but only the player who uses the last repair box flies away leaving the others doomed.

Controls

Each control scheme consists of movement and action button. Only keyboard and gamepad are supported.

  • Gamepad (Stick + A)
  • Keyboard (WSAD + Left Shift, Arrows + Right Alt, 8546 + 0 - Numlock)
